items.title: Jim Cramer Highlights Procter & Gamble (PG) “Plans to Cut 7,000 Jobs Over Two Years”
items.description: We recently published a list of 15 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. Discussing what is affecting the consumer packaged goods stocks, Cramer mentioned The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) […]
